title: Nz/Hamilton Gamers and MSI at sylvia park movies
body: Hi guys and gals looking for some LoL friends alittle closer to home so any gamers from Hamilton hit me up :) and also any1 from hamilton going to the MSI veiwing at sylvia park next month?? thanks heaps

replies.body: That's exactly it can't wait it's gonna be so fun and gonna hopefully met heaps people :)
Hey man, Im from auckland but i was thinking about going to the Screening in sylvia park. c:{{sticker:slayer-jinx-catface}}
You should totally do it! It's gonna be great :D
Thanks! Im excited to go! It would be fun to meet heaps of people c:
